main event: A civilian reported observing what they believed to be a hot air balloon in the sky over Memphis, Tennessee.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 4 minutes., The observer felt they had seen something similar before., The object appeared to be moving at a high rate of speed., There was no physical evidence leftover from the sighting., The object was described as having a cigar shape with fuzzy edges.
witness description: Civilian observer who reported the sighting
